婴儿死亡率、低出生体重和早产：时间趋势和种族不平等美国每年出生近 400 万婴儿。尽管产科和围产期护理有所改善，但美国的婴儿死亡率仍然令人担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Infant-mortality-low-birth-weight-and-preterm-births-A-look-at-time-trends-and-racial-inequities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Infant-mortality-low-birth-weight-and-preterm-births-A-look-at-time-trends-and-racial-inequities.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e0bbc7d-3e98-4075-9200-adadad9bc95f Thu, 29 Jun 2023 09:43:24 -0400 Infant mortality, low birth weight and preterm births: A look at time trends and racial inequities
ATCC 宣布获得 BARDA 新奖项，以进一步支持其医疗对策临床研究网络ATCC 将作为一个集中设施，支持 BARDA 临床样本和研究产品的存储和分发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/ATCC-announces-new-award-from-BARDA-to-further-support-its-medical-countermeasures-clinical-studies-network.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/ATCC-announces-new-award-from-BARDA-to-further-support-its-medical-countermeasures-clinical-studies-network.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de47b822-911d-487c-a114-c747d4372690 Thu, 29 Jun 2023 08:37:00 -0400 ATCC announces new award from BARDA to further support its medical countermeasures clinical studies network
